course_title: Special Topics MESAS-300 Level: Contentious Politics
class_notes:
(Same as POLS 385 3)
(Complete Topic: Contentious Politics and Protest Movements of the Modern Middle East)
(This course will provide an introduction into the most relevant contentious politics and protest movements that have emerged in the Middle East since the mid-20th century to the present day. From communist protest in Iraq to the Arab Spring protests across the region in 2011 to the use of modern music and art to effect political change, this course will demonstrate the ways in which people in different times and in protest of different types of political institutions have organized to effect political change. In so doing, we will analyze the most effective means of political protest and organization (eg, the use of mass gatherings, electoral campaigns and boycotts, social media) in the authoritarian and semi-authoritarian regimes of the Middle East.)
